attributes.action: Abolish the £120 Annual Nursing registration fee.
attributes.additional_details: Income, pressure and stress are stretched enough with the Covid pandemic without requiring the nurses and midwife to pay just to do their job.
attributes.background: Abolish the £120 Annual Nursing registration fee, a fee Nurses and midwives need to pay every year just to be allowed to do their job and help people.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555025

The professional fees for nurses are set by the professional bodies for nurses, not the Government or House of Commons, but the above petition calls on the Government to reimburse nurses for the cost of these fees.
